TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaAttribute extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnnotated

summary.span: 按万维网联合会 (W3C) 指定的方式表示来自 XML 架构的 元素。

span.span: Represents the element from the XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: 属性为其他文档元素提供额外信息。

span.span: Attributes provide additional information for other document elements.

summary.span: 属性标记嵌套在架构的文档元素标记之间。

span.span: The attribute tag is nested between the tags of a document's element for the schema.

summary.span: XML 文档将属性显示为元素开始标记中的已命名项。

span.span: The XML document displays attributes as named items in the opening tag of an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性声明可以作为元素的子元素出现， `schema` (具有全局范围) 或在复杂类型定义中。Attribute declarations can be present as child elements of the `schema` element (having global scope) or within complex type definitions. 对于复杂类型，属性声明可作为本地声明或对具有全局范围的属性的引用出现。For complex types, attribute declarations can be present as local declarations or references to attributes with global scope. 全局和局部属性声明都具有引用现有简单类型的可选类型属性。Both global and local attribute declarations have the optional type attribute that refers to an existing simple type. 如果未使用可选类型属性，则 (全局或局部) 的属性声明必须定义一个本地简单类型。If the optional type attribute is not used, the attribute declaration (global or local) must define a local simple type. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 `attribute` 元素。The following example creates the `attribute` element. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchemaAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchemaAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchemaAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的 XML 文件是针对前面的代码示例生成的。The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchemaAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchemaAttribute Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

span.span: Gets an object representing the type of the attribute based on the or of the attribute.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是一个后架构验证信息集属性。This property is a post-schema-validation infoset property.

summary.span: 基于保存编译后 属性值的特性的 或 ，获取公共语言运行时 (CLR) 对象。

span.span: Gets the common language runtime (CLR) object based on the or of the attribute that holds the post-compilation value of the property.

value.span: 公共运行库 (CLR) 对象，保存 属性的编译后值。

span.span: The common runtime library (CLR) object that holds the post-compilation value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果特性具有内置的 XML 架构类型，或者 如果特性具有用户定义的类型，则对象可以为。The object can be if the attribute has a built-in XML Schema type or if the attribute has a user-defined type. 此属性是一个后架构验证信息集属性。This property is a post-schema-validation infoset property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此 属性在 .NET Framework 的2.0 版本中已过时，并且已被 属性替换。The property is obsolete in the 2.0 version of the .NET Framework and has been replaced by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置属性的默认值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value for the attribute.
The default value for the attribute.
The default is a null reference.
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DefaultValue` 属性指示当特性不存在时，将使用提供的值无条件地在 XML 文档中显示特性。`DefaultValue` property indicates that the attribute is to appear unconditionally in the XML document, using the supplied value whenever the attribute is not present. 默认情况下，此属性设置为 null，表示没有为该特性提供默认值。By default, this property is set to null to indicate that no default value is supplied for the attribute. `fixed`和 `default` 属性互相排斥。The `fixed` and `default` properties are mutually exclusive. 可选。Optional. 默认值为 NULL。The default is null.

summary.span: 获取或设置属性的固定值。

span.span: Gets or sets the fixed value for the attribute.
The fixed value for the attribute.
The default is null.
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FixedValue` 指示特性值（如果存在）必须等于提供的值。`FixedValue` indicates that the attribute value, if present, must equal the supplied value. 默认情况下，此属性设置为 null，这意味着没有为属性提供固定值。By default, this property is set to null, which means that no fixed value is supplied for the attribute. `fixed`和 `default` 属性互相排斥。The `fixed` and `default` properties are mutually exclusive. 可选。Optional.

Optional.

summary.span: 获取或设置属性的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the attribute.
The name of the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该名称必须是 NCName (无冒号名称) ，如万维网联合会 (W3C) XML 命名空间规范中所定义。The name must be an NCName (no-colon name) as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Namespaces specification. 根据架构验证 XML 文档时，将根据架构中的元素验证文档中的每个属性 `attribute` 。When an XML document is validated against a schema, each attribute in the document is validated against an `attribute` element in the schema. 使用 `attribute` 与 `name` 文档中的特性的本地名称匹配的特性的元素用于验证该特性。The `attribute` element with a `name` attribute that matches the local name of the attribute in the document is used to validate that attribute. `Name`和 `RefName` 属性互相排斥。The `Name` and `RefName` properties are mutually exclusive. 可选。Optional.

summary.span: 获取或设置在此架构（或指定命名空间指示的另一个架构）中声明的属性的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of an attribute declared in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).
The name of the attribute declared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RefName`必须是 QName。The `RefName` must be a QName. 类型可以包括命名空间前缀。The type can include a namespace prefix. `Name`和 `RefName` 属性互相排斥。The `Name` and `RefName` properties are mutually exclusive. 可选。Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SchemaTypeName``SchemaType`不能同时设置和属性。`SchemaTypeName` and `SchemaType` properties cannot be set at the same time.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the simple type defined in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SchemaTypeName`不能同时设置和属性。`SchemaTypeName` and properties cannot be set at the same time. 该类型必须是 QName。The type must be a QName. 类型可以包括命名空间前缀。The type can include a namespace prefix. 可选。Optional.

summary.span: 获取或设置如何使用该属性的相关信息。

span.span: Gets or sets information about how the attribute is used.
One of the following values: None, Prohibited, Optional, or Required.
The default is Optional.
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定此属性，则此属性必须具有下表中所示的值之一。If specified, this attribute must have one of the values shown in the following table. |枚举Enum|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|特性没有值。Attribute has no value.| |`Prohibited`|不能使用属性。Attribute cannot be used.| |`Optional`|属性是可选的并且可以具有任何值。Attribute is optional and may have any value. 这是默认设置。This is the default.| |`Required`|属性必须出现一次。Attribute must appear once.|
